00036 #include "VertexCryptBoundaryForce.hpp"
00037 #include "MathsCustomFunctions.hpp"
00038 
00039 template<unsigned DIM>
00040 VertexCryptBoundaryForce<DIM>::VertexCryptBoundaryForce(double forceStrength)
00041    : AbstractForce<DIM>(),
00042      mForceStrength(forceStrength)
00043 {
00044     // We don't want the force to act in the wrong direction
00045     assert(mForceStrength > 0.0);
00046 }
00047 
00048 template<unsigned DIM>
00049 VertexCryptBoundaryForce<DIM>::~VertexCryptBoundaryForce()
00050 {
00051 }
00052 
00053 template<unsigned DIM>
00054 void VertexCryptBoundaryForce<DIM>::AddForceContribution(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation)
00055 {
00056     // Helper variable that is a static cast of the cell population
00057     VertexBasedCellPopulation<DIM>* p_cell_population = static_cast<VertexBasedCellPopulation<DIM>*>(&rCellPopulation);
00058 
00059     // Throw an exception message if not using a VertexBasedCellPopulation
00060     if (dynamic_cast<VertexBasedCellPopulation<DIM>*>(&rCellPopulation) == NULL)
00061     {
00062         EXCEPTION("VertexCryptBoundaryForce is to be used with VertexBasedCellPopulations only");
00063     }
00064 
00065     // Iterate over nodes
00066     for (typename AbstractMesh<DIM,DIM>::NodeIterator node_iter = p_cell_population->rGetMesh().GetNodeIteratorBegin();
00067          node_iter != p_cell_population->rGetMesh().GetNodeIteratorEnd();
00068          ++node_iter)
00069     {
00070         double y = node_iter->rGetLocation()[1]; // y-coordinate of node
00071 
00072         // If the node lies below the line y=0, then add the boundary force contribution to the node forces
00073         if (y < 0.0)
00074         {
00075             c_vector<double, DIM> boundary_force = zero_vector<double>(DIM);
00076             boundary_force[1] = mForceStrength*SmallPow(y, 2);
00077 
00078             node_iter->AddAppliedForceContribution(boundary_force);
00079         }
00080     }
00081 }
00082 
00083 template<unsigned DIM>
00084 double VertexCryptBoundaryForce<DIM>::GetForceStrength() const
00085 {
00086     return mForceStrength;
00087 }
00088 
00089 template<unsigned DIM>
00090 void VertexCryptBoundaryForce<DIM>::OutputForceParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00091 {
00092     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<ForceStrength>" << mForceStrength << "</ForceStrength>\n";
00093 
00094     // Call method on direct parent class
00095     AbstractForce<DIM>::OutputForceParameters(rParamsFile);
00096 }

00103 template class VertexCryptBoundaryForce<2>;
00104 template class VertexCryptBoundaryForce<3>;
